languages.text: "Даже в этом вы поступили против закона Императора. Но я принимаю приговор". {n}Маршал прикладывает кулак к груди и церемониально произносит:{/n} "Да сократит Он мои дни, да призовет меня на суд Свой".

"Even in this, you went against the Emperor's Law. But I accept the sentence." {n}The Marshal presses a fist to his chest and solemnly declares,{/n} "May He shorten my days; may He summon me to His judgement."
languages.original_text: "Даже в этом вы поступили против закона Императора. Но я принимаю приговор". {n}Маршал прикладывает кулак к груди и церемониально произносит:{/n} "Да сократит Он мои дни, да призовет меня на суд Свой".

traits.locale_text: "Even in this, you went against the Emperor's Law. But I accept the sentence." {n}The Marshal presses a fist to his chest and solemnly declares,{/n} "May He shorten my days; may He summon me to His judgement."

"Even in this, you would contradict the Emperor's law. Nevertheless, I accept my sentence." {n}The Marshal brings a closed fist to his chest and adds solemnly,{/n} "May He shorten my days and summon me to face His judgement early."

"Even in this, you went against the Emperor's Law. But I accept the sentence." {n}The Marshal presses a fist to his chest and solemnly declares,{/n} "May He shorten my days; may He summon me to His judgement."

"Even in this, you would contradict the Emperor's law. Nevertheless, I accept my sentence." {n}The Marshal brings a closed fist to his chest and adds solemnly,{/n} "May He shorten my days and summon me to face His judgement early."

"Even in this, you went against the Emperor's Law. But I accept the sentence." {n}The Marshal presses a fist to his chest and solemnly declares,{/n} "May He shorten my days; may He summon me to His judgement."

"Even in this, you went against the Emperor's Law. But I accept the sentence." {n}The Marshal presses a fist to his chest and solemnly declares,{/n} "May He shorten my days; may He summon me to His judgement."

"Even in this, you went against the Emperor's Law. But I accept the sentence." {n}The marshal presses a fist to his chest and says ceremonially:{/n} "May He shorten my days; may He summon me to His judgement."

"Even in this, you went against the Emperor's Law. But I accept the sentence." {n}The Marshal presses a fist to his chest and solemnly declares,{/n} "May He shorten my days; may He summon me to His judgement."

languages.text: "Dennoch habt Ihr Euch gegen das Gesetz des Imperators gestellt. Aber ich nehme die Strafe an." {n}Der Marschall presst eine Faust gegen seine Brust und erklärt feierlich:{/n} "Möge Er meine Tage verkürzen und mich zu Seinem Urteil rufen."
languages.original_text: "Even in this, you went against the Emperor's Law. But I accept the sentence." {n}The Marshal presses a fist to his chest and solemnly declares,{/n} "May He shorten my days; may He summon me to His judgement."

traits.locale_text: "Dennoch habt Ihr Euch gegen das Gesetz des Imperators gestellt. Aber ich nehme die Strafe an." {n}Der Marschall presst eine Faust gegen seine Brust und erklärt feierlich:{/n} "Möge Er meine Tage verkürzen und mich zu Seinem Urteil rufen."

languages.text: « Une fois encore, vous méprisez la loi de l'Empereur... Mais j'accepte cette sentence. » {n}Le maréchal porte son poing fermé à sa poitrine et déclare sur un ton solennel :{/n} « Puisse-t-Il écourter le temps qu'il me reste et m'appeler à Lui pour me faire subir Son jugement. »
languages.original_text: "Even in this, you went against the Emperor's Law. But I accept the sentence." {n}The Marshal presses a fist to his chest and solemnly declares,{/n} "May He shorten my days; may He summon me to His judgement."

traits.locale_text: « Une fois encore, vous méprisez la loi de l'Empereur... Mais j'accepte cette sentence. » {n}Le maréchal porte son poing fermé à sa poitrine et déclare sur un ton solennel :{/n} « Puisse-t-Il écourter le temps qu'il me reste et m'appeler à Lui pour me faire subir Son jugement. »

languages.text: “即便如此，这也违背了帝皇的律法。不过，我愿意接受这样的判决。”{n}元帅握紧了一只拳头，按在胸前，郑重地开了口。{/n}“愿祂缩短我的余生，愿祂召唤我接受审判。”
languages.original_text: "Even in this, you went against the Emperor's Law. But I accept the sentence." {n}The Marshal presses a fist to his chest and solemnly declares,{/n} "May He shorten my days; may He summon me to His judgement."

traits.locale_text: “即便如此，这也违背了帝皇的律法。不过，我愿意接受这样的判决。”{n}元帅握紧了一只拳头，按在胸前，郑重地开了口。{/n}“愿祂缩短我的余生，愿祂召唤我接受审判。”

languages.text: «Hasta en esto contradice la ley del Emperador. Pero acataré la sentencia». {n}El Mariscal se lleva el puño al pecho y declara solemnemente:{/n} «Que el Emperador acorte mi vida y me convoque pronto a su juicio».
languages.original_text: "Even in this, you went against the Emperor's Law. But I accept the sentence." {n}The Marshal presses a fist to his chest and solemnly declares,{/n} "May He shorten my days; may He summon me to His judgement."

traits.locale_text: «Hasta en esto contradice la ley del Emperador. Pero acataré la sentencia». {n}El Mariscal se lleva el puño al pecho y declara solemnemente:{/n} «Que el Emperador acorte mi vida y me convoque pronto a su juicio».

languages.text: 「この件においても、あなたは皇帝陛下の法に背きました。しかし、私はその判決を受け入れます」{n}将帥は胸に拳を当て、厳かに宣言した。{/n}「どうか陛下が私の命を縮め、陛下の裁きに私を召喚されんことを」
languages.original_text: "Even in this, you went against the Emperor's Law. But I accept the sentence." {n}The Marshal presses a fist to his chest and solemnly declares,{/n} "May He shorten my days; may He summon me to His judgement."

traits.locale_text: 「この件においても、あなたは皇帝陛下の法に背きました。しかし、私はその判決を受け入れます」{n}将帥は胸に拳を当て、厳かに宣言した。{/n}「どうか陛下が私の命を縮め、陛下の裁きに私を召喚されんことを」

languages.text: "Bu kararınızla bile İmparator'un Kanunu'na karşı geliyorsunuz. Lakin cezamı kabul ediyorum." {n}Miralay, yumruğunu göğsüne vurup katı bir sesle konuşuyor.{/n} "Umarım ki O, günlerimi kısaltıp beni tez vakitte hükmüyle karşı karşıya bırakır."
languages.original_text: "Even in this, you went against the Emperor's Law. But I accept the sentence." {n}The Marshal presses a fist to his chest and solemnly declares,{/n} "May He shorten my days; may He summon me to His judgement."

traits.locale_text: "Bu kararınızla bile İmparator'un kanununa karşı geliyorsunuz. Lakin cezamı kabul ediyorum." {n}Miralay, yumruğunu göğsüne vuruyor ve katı bir sesle konuşuyor.{/n} "Umarım ki O, günlerimi kısaltıp beni tez vakitte Kendi hükmüyle karşı karşıya bırakır."

"Bu kararınızla bile İmparator'un kanununa karşı geliyorsunuz. Lakin cezamı kabul ediyorum." {n}Miralay yumruğunu göğsüne vuruyor ve katı bir sesle konuşuyor:{/n} "Umarım ki O, günlerimi kısaltıp beni tez vakitte Kendi hükmüyle karşı karşıya bırakır."
